attributes.action: Promote Captain Tom Moore to Major Tom Moore
attributes.additional_details: Because Tom Moore is a hero and deserves to be recognised as such
attributes.background: Because of the captain's selfless service to the NHS, we propose his rank of captain should be elevated to Major

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
